projects.name: 1. SimpleBlog
projects.description:
Mini blogging platform.

Functionality:

  • Browse, post, edit, and delete blog posts.
  • Search(full-text) blog posts.
  • User profiles.
  • Follow/unfollow bloggers.
  • Send private messages.
  • Message notifications.
Features:
  • Session-based authentication.
  • Localization (TODO).

TODO: Localization, External Logging, Redis(cache, celary). Fully deploy project

projects.name: 2. Filmogram
projects.description:
Social network similar to instagram/flickr.

Functionality:

  • Browse and post photos.
  • Comment on photos.
  • Like/unlike photos.
  • Follow/unfollow users.
  • User profiles.
  • User notifications (when someone likes your photo).

Features:

  • Session based authentication.

TODO: Manage Inventory, Deploy onto AWS/Azure

projects.name: 3. LeicaRentals
projects.description:
Lens rental app.

Functionality:

  • Manage lens catalog.
  • Manage customer catalog.
  • Manage lens rentals.

Features:

  • Session-based Authentication.
  • DataTables for inventory management.
  • Typeahead for lens rental form.

TODO:Manage available Lenses.

projects.name: 4. CitySkyscrapers API
projects.description:
Restful API for City Skyscrapers with level 3 maturity (hypermedia). The resources are cities and child resources are city landmarks.

Functionality:

  • Get single, collection and child resources.
  • Post/Delete single and child resources.
  • Put/Patch single and child resources for full updates and partial updates.
  • Validation and error/fault handling.
  • Paging, filtering and sorting.
  • TODO: Http caching and rate limiting.
  • TODO: Token-Based Authentication and Authorization

TODO:logging to file, Documentation, HttpCaching, rate limiting, authentication and authorization.

projects.name: 5. Pokemon API
projects.description: A simple API that consumes Pokemon data from pokepai.co (Pokemon API) and caches it using Redis.
